[**ExtraVM**](https://extravm.com) offers OpenVZ and KVM VPS in Canada, France, the U.S. and soon AU/ASIA. If you're interested check out our LET plans below. We take weekly backups of all OpenVZ VPS, and have multiple layers of resource and hardware monitoring setup for each server, reliability is our main goal, unlike some others. We also include IPv6 with every server.  
  
If you have a question just [submit a ticket](https://www.extravm.com/billing/submitticket.php?step=2&deptid=3), typical response time during North America daytime hours is under 15 minutes. You can also contact us via live chat on our website if we're available.
